pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
I think there's an issue editing links of nested models. I think it shouldn't be possible to edit them, right?

1. Insert a beer can
1. Double click the beer on the 3D view, a link inspector opens
1. Change the collision to a box and apply, the can moves and the collision changes.
1. Save the model, the saved model has a cylinder as collision.
content.html:
I think there's an issue editing links of nested models. I think it shouldn't be possible to edit them, right?

  1. Insert a beer can
  2. Double click the beer on the 3D view, a link inspector opens
  3. Change the collision to a box and apply, the can moves and the collision changes.
  4. Save the model, the saved model has a cylinder as collision.
